sentences.sContent: She undertook the task of monitoring the elections.
sentences.sCn: 她承担了监督选举的任务。

sentences.sContent: ...The designers who undertake green fashion still face many challenges...

synos.tran: 承担，保证；从事；同意；试图

words.tran: 承担者；承办人；殡仪业者

trans.tranCn: 从事； 承担； 同意； 保证
trans.tranOther: When you undertake a task or job, you start doing it and accept responsibility for it
